text: Miss [redacted_name] prepared paper plates, colored paper, and crayons to create dinosaursğŸ¦– As the children worked on their dinosaurs, they shared ideas and helped each other with their designs. The dinosaurs featured rainbow patterns and even portraits, resulting in a variety of uniquely personalized creations. M[redacted_name]drew her own adorable dinosaur with crayons inside the paper plate. By freely choosing the design and colors of their dinosaurs, children enhance their ability to express their own ideas. W[redacted_name]was teaching S[redacted_name]how to cut out the head of the dinosaur. Collaborating with other children while working fosters cooperation and communication skills.
